casebody.data:
No. 11-5350 (11A81). In re Mark Anthony Stroman, Petitioner. 564 U.S. 1054, 132 S. Ct. 46,

180 L. Ed. 2d 914,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 5023. July 20, 2011.

Application for stay of execution of sentence of death, presented to Justice Scalia, and by him referred to the Court, denied. Petition for writ of habeas corpus denied.
